fields.name: MaintenanceWindowTimeZone
fields.description: Time zone for maintenance as defined in https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.timezoneinfo.findsystemtimezonebyid?view=net-5.0. Must be set if useLocalTime is true.

fields.name: MaintenanceWindows
fields.description: List of maintenance windows. Maintenance windows are 2 hours long.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of maintenance for session host components.

fields.name: UseSessionHostLocalTime
fields.description: Whether to use localTime of the virtual machine.
